subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Falling behind by 20 points in the third quarter, and squandering a chance to build momentum after the All-Star Game break, the Knicks were defeated by the 76ers on Wednesday night.
snippet: Falling behind by 20 points in the third quarter, and squandering a chance to build momentum after the All-Star Game break, the Knicks were defeated by the 76ers on Wednesday night.
